about_the_game:
The main character is a card user.
defeats monsters and strengthens his cards
and aim for the depths of the labyrinth.

Even if he is defeated by a monster and dies
the hero has the ability to repeat the loop
the power of the strengthened card is inherited,
challenge the labyrinth again and again.

In the fantasy world built by roguelike x card game x loop scenario,
Create your own deck and reach the deepest part of the dragon labyrinth.

■Story

Due to the activities of the “Time Traveler” who repeats the loop,
The Witch of Doom lost her power of immortality and was sealed behind the Gate of Time.

However, peace did not last long, and in a world where the Witch of Doom no longer exists,
A new dark force was about to make its move, aiming at the Gate of Time, which connects to the other world.

The two Gates of Time opened at the same time.
The extraordinary situation of the two gates opening at the same time left the travelers of time with no recourse.
The Witch of Time Walking made a strange proposal.

It was a crazy proposal for a joint battle, which is not the idea of ordinary people.
It was a proposal for a crazy joint struggle.


The Time Traveller is trying to save the world.
There is the [Gate of Time] where [the one who leads the world to ruin] is sealed.
I turned our feet again to the depths of the Dragon's Labyrinth.

content_descriptors.notes: Because of the theme of returning to death, there is bloodshed and violence on the level of a juvenile magazine.

name: DUNGEON WALK3－奇妙な狂闘－ Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics 620
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

short_description: 【主人公】だけがループを繰り返す世界で、最適なカードを選択し、何度でも強敵に挑め。ローグライク×カードゲーム×ループシナリオで構築されたファンタジー世界で、自分だけのデッキを作り、竜迷宮の最奥へ辿り着け。
